summary: Drain someone\'s health, and kill them instantly! Does 4000 damage/s.
descriptionHtml:
This is the power, only the Masters of Magic can use.

Details
------
Cost: 131
ID: 1D000D62 
Damage: 4000/s
Type: Concentrated
Effect: Absorb Health
Animation: Vampire Drain

How to acquire
-------
Press ~ to open console
Type: player.addspell 1d000d62
Press Tab to enter inventory \"menu\"
Click Magic
Search for SuddenDeath in destruction menu

All by Me: Xtrendence!!!
author: Xtrendence
